00040 namespace affxgrc
00041 {
00042 
00043 /*! The current version of the GRC file */
00044 #define GRC_VERSION 1
00045 
00046 /*! The magic number of the GRC file */
00047 #define GRC_MAGIC 129
00048 
00049 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00050 
00051 /*! This class holds the coordinates of those probes used by the GCAST algorithm. */
00052 class CGRCFileData
00053 {
00054 public:
00055         /*! Constructor */
00056         CGRCFileData();
00057 
00058         /*! Destructor */
00059         ~CGRCFileData();
00060 
00061 protected:
00062         /*! The name of the GRC file */
00063         std::string m_strFileName;
00064 
00065         /*! The version number of the file */
00066         int32_t m_Version;
00067 
00068         /*! Checks if the file is of a release format
00069          *
00070          * @return True if release format (not early access)
00071          */
00072         bool IsReleaseFormat();
00073 
00074         /*! Reads a pre-release (early access) format GRC file.
00075          *
00076          * @param grid The grid control data to fill from the GRC file.
00077          * @return True if successful
00078          */
00079         bool ReadPreReleaseFormat(affymetrix_grid_control::GridControlData &grid);
00080 
00081         /*! Reads a release format GRC file.
00082          *
00083          * @param grid The grid control data to fill from the GRC file.
00084          * @return True if successful
00085          */
00086         bool ReadReleaseFormat(affymetrix_grid_control::GridControlData &grid);
00087 
00088 public:
00089         /*! Sets the file name.
00090          * @param name The full path to the GRC file.
00091          */
00092         void SetFileName (const char *name) { m_strFileName = name; }
00093 
00094         /*! Gets the file name.
00095          * @return The full path to the GRC file.
00096          */
00097         const std::string &GetFileName() const { return m_strFileName; }
00098 
00099         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00100          * @param grid The grid control data to fill from the GRC file.
00101          * @return True if successful.
00102          */
00103         bool Read(affymetrix_grid_control::GridControlData &grid);
00104 
00105         /*! Checks for the existance of a file.
00106          * @return True if the file exists.
00107          */
00108         bool Exists();
00109 };
